5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Abdullah bin Abu Qatadah that his father said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘I get up to perform prayer and I intend to make it long, but then I hear an infant crying, so I make it short, because I do not like to cause distress to his mother.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب الإِمَامِ يُخَفِّفُ الصَّلاَةَ إِذَا حَدَثَ أَمْرٌ
chapter.eng-name: The Imam should make the Prayer short if something happens
